snippet: The discovery of the altered wheat in Oregon in 2013 prompted Japan and South Korea to temporarily suspend some orders.
abstract: Monsanto says it will pay $2.4 million to settle dispute with farmers in the Pacific Northwest over genetically modified wheat.
lead_paragraph: The discovery of the altered wheat in Oregon in 2013 prompted Japan and South Korea to temporarily suspend some orders.

headline.main: Monsanto to Pay $2.4. Million in G.M.O. Wheat Dispute
headline.print_headline: Monsanto to Pay $2.4. Million in G.M.O. Wheat Dispute
